meanings.definition: A person who designs or arranges type.
meanings.sent1: The typographers carefully selected the font for the book cover.
meanings.sent2: Many typographers prefer to work with digital fonts rather than traditional printing methods.
meanings.sent3: The typographers had a font-tastic time creating the new logo.
meanings.sent4: The typographers painted the words on the canvas of the page.
meanings.sent5: The typographers' expertise in typography made the text visually appealing.

meanings.definition: Those who specialize in the art of typography.
meanings.sent1: We hired a team of typographers to work on the magazine layout.
meanings.sent2: Typographers often collaborate with graphic designers to achieve the desired look.
meanings.sent3: The typographers' office was filled with different fonts and colors.
meanings.sent4: The typographers sculpted words like artists shaping clay.
meanings.sent5: The typographers' attention to detail transformed the text into a work of art.
